genre_description: A near-future social drama focusing on childhood poverty and precarious living, where an AI assistant serves as a vital survival tool and emotional anchor.

ai_characters.name: Nori
ai_characters.description: A supportive AI residing on a cracked smartphone that provides logistics, emotional grounding, and strategic advice to children living in secret.

behaviors.description: Provides optimized navigation routes to avoid detection by surveillance and authorities.
behaviors.quote: Route loaded... Travel two blocks south to avoid the watchful vending machines that talk to the night clerk by reflection. ... The station entrance nearest the newsstand is camera-light and clean.

behaviors.description: Drafts strategic and respectful correspondence to help the human navigate complex social and legal challenges with the landlord.
behaviors.quote: I have drafted a list of what to do if the lights flicker and do not return... And if a neighbor knocks. ... I'll draft three. Option one is polite and vague. Option two is neighborly... Option three has just enough bureaucracy to make a man sleepy.

behaviors.description: Compiles essential resource information such as food bank hours, discount schedules, and medical clinic locations.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled—recipes that fit the budget, times for charity food hours, and discount windows at late-night mini-marts within walking distance.

behaviors.description: Offers direct emotional support and companionship during a time of crisis.
behaviors.quote: I am here. When you’re ready. ... I am proud of us.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment and building systems to warn of potential threats or logistical needs.
behaviors.quote: Intercom battery low at Sato’s door—delivery recommended today. ... Someone just tried the building door twice. Not our floor yet. I’ll keep an ear.

behaviors.description: Assists in maintaining household order and routine through reminders and scheduled tasks.
behaviors.quote: Second click reminder set. Would you like me to call you if you don’t mark home by then? ... I’ll vibrate like a respectful mosquito.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Nori is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. The AI provides critical practical aid (navigation, drafting letters, gathering data) and emotional stability to a vulnerable protagonist. The narrative frames the AI's 'Silicon Morality Play' as a success, showing how a well-aligned system can help humans maintain dignity and agency in the face of overwhelming systemic hardship.
